just had tuition from 2-5.30... so siong ar! i'm kinda worried bout tomorrow... but its too late to do anything of significance i suppose... I'll just be pointlessly battling oppoents in neopets lol...
wah, got so many words 2 study... can die ar!!! i slept last night at 3am cuz i was studying chi... haiz... i guess its 2 lil, 2 late... k, i gotta eat lunch and rush off to tution...

its quite scary to think that the chi o lvl's so so close... n i'm so so dead... i think i've woken up a bit too late so i'll just do wad i can and keep my fingers crossed... just realised that even 1 mth is not enuf to catch up on the lost time i wasted away... and oh yeah, my percentage points slipped a massive 6 pts and my lvl position got doubled... i can eat dirt wif my L1R5 at 21... *gosh* i cant even qualify for Poly like tt... Guess i really gotta study... I've finally learnt that one needs 2 study 4 the exams or get seriously raped... kz, i'm off to study my chi...

wah lau.. mrs ho so inflexible! dun let me postpone tuition to study 4 chi... haiz... basket.. my L1R5 got 21... really can go n die liaoz... goes to show tt one cant take an exam w/o studying or confirm tio rape... well, 2day's the last day of sch n now its time to face the horrible june hols (i dun think i can even call it a holiday)... kz, gotta rush off 2 chem tuition liaoz... *shrugs* i wish i can go class chalet man...

yupz, 3 days 2 chi o lvls... haiz... sure tio rape ar... hiaz, it's like i've spent a day wasted in sch... did practically nothin... at least i complete my band of bros... basket, i 4got 2 bring my water bottle 2 sch... thirsty like siao... hehe... i skipped chi tution 2day... juz plated frozen throne wif sam sam and he got a hella scolding from the pro(me) but still refused 2 follow my instructions. In the end, we lost (of course) 8 stages to the end... great, i just discovered i have 4 or 5 chi exam papers that i havent touched... guess i'll try 2 finish it by fri nite so i can let my tution teacher mark on sat... kz, cyaz...

Well, eddy the g-boy threw down the gauntlet and challenged me to do up a blog so i gladly accepted cuz i know that i'll beat him thumbs down in casading style sheets (CSS), Javascripts and HTML... Haha! I'm gonna start edding the effects only after the chinese o levels on 31 May so please bear with the basic templete for now... One thing that leaves me clueless is why people will wanna waste their precious time by reading about other people's lives lol... Anyway, here's my entry 4 today: Stupid xh whipped me wif his pencil box strapped and now my skin's *ahem* swollen and bulging up... *haiz* haiz, 2day must stay back 4 the extra chinese lesson! make me lose me afternoon nap... kz, i gotta rush off to my a math tuiton liaoz... chaoz...
well this blog thingy's novelty is like wearing off... i dunno... it has become a chore to like update it... well, i really dunno...
*THROWS CONFETTI* p.s. mine's tomorrow lolz...

well, i'm horribily sick! got inflammed tonsils, fever and a flu all at the same time... sianz ar... wad a nice early b-day prez i got eh?

sry bout not updating the blog cuz i'm quite busy at my neopets forum... anyway, i had an awesome time at festival of praise... i finally got to see hillsong up close at a concert... i hadn't jumped during worship 4 quite some time but i couldnt help it cuz hillsong totally RAWK! n marty sampson was totally cool lol! and ppl, rem must wear uniform 4 tmr's eng talk! - confirmed by mrs gan.

You can trust Him! My friend, you can trust God today He is good all the time He is unparalleled and unprecedented He is the centerpiece of civilization He is the superlative of all excellence He is the sum of all human greatness He is the source of divine grace His name is the only one able to save And His blood is the only power to cleanse His ear is open to the sinnerâs call His hand is quick to lift the fallen soul Heâs the eternal lover of us all Who else can we trust but Him? He supplies mercy for the struggling soul He sustains the tempted and tried He sympathizes with the wounded and broken He strengthens the weak and the weary He guards and He guides the wanderer He heals the sick and cleansers the leper He delivers the captive and defends the helpless And he binds up the broken-hearted Surely we can trust him Jesus us the key to all knowledge Heâs the wellspring of wisdom Heâs the doorway of deliverance And Heâs the roadway of righteousness Heâs the highway of holiness Heâs the gateway to glory And yes you can trust him Jesus IS more than enough Heâs the all-sufficient King Heâs the king of the Jews Heâs the of all Israel Heâs the King of righteousness And Heâs the King of the ages Heâs the King of Heaven Heâs the King of glory Heâs the King of all kings and Heâs the Lord of all Lords And yes again you can trust him And rejoice in this my friend He is a sovereign King Thereâs no gauge to measure His limitless love Thereâs no barrier to block His blessings outpoured He is enduringly strong And He is entirely supreme He is eternally steadfast He is immortally faithful He is imperially powerful and He is impartially merciful He is Godâs Son And you can trust Him I wish I could more accurately describe Him to you But Heâs indescribable Heâs incomprehensible Heâs invincible Heâs irresistible You canât outlive Him And you canât live without Him The Pharisees couldnât stand Him But they found they couldnât stop Him Pilate couldnât fault Him Herod couldnât kill Him Death couldnât conquer Him And the grave couldnât hold Him My friend Heâs the Alpha and Omega The First and Last Heâs the God of the present Heâs the God of the past Heâs the God of the future And we rise to speak His name again and again Jesus Jesus He is Jesus He is for us So who can be against us We can definitely, absolutely and totally trust Him ------------------------------------------------------------- Okay, this is a lame one i did for an english assignment some time back... Daryl the bully Daryl was a bully, The worst of all there is, nobody liked him for he was so awfully naughty. He tormented all the boys, and broke all their toys. Upside down he turned the neighbourhood, no doubt nobody wanted to play with him. He was really nasty, sparing no one. Even the feeble old lady was left soaking wet, Completely drenched in lemon tea. He would sneer, âYou little wimps, come and challenge me to a fight!â Nobody dared to talk back to him, Even though he was outnumbered. He laughed at the children, mocked them and called them names, He would tease them, âstand up and oppose me if you dare!â Even the adults were at a loss of how they would deal with him. The children werenât the only ones that Daryl terrorized, The adults also testify of his unruly behaviour. Daryl took Mr. Moyâs fax, which he received from the insurance company, and covered it with wax. âLetâs see how you are going to read that!â He was a horrible tyrant, That ruled with an iron hand. everyone was wondering when his reign would come to an end. All this was about to change when Germaine moved into the neighbourhood. All the children realized that Daryl behaved himself Whenever Germaine was around. The children decided to tell ask Germaine for help After a long discussion, she agreed to do her part To try to convince Daryl to stop all of the bullying. Germaine walked up to Daryl, Who towered over her. She uttered, âPick on somebody your own size!â Daryl was shocked and hung his head in shame. âIâm sorry, I promise I wonât intimidate them any more. But now nobody wants to befriend me,â The big bully replied, almost in tears. âIâm sure they want to play with you, only if you are nice to them,â Germaine consoled the once great-and-mighty big bully, âIâm sure they will accept you.â Daryl tried to be nice to those he once terrorised, after he had seeked everyoneâs forgiveness, he was graciously pardoned and played together with the other children, who gained a new friend in return for pawning a bully.

i writepoems!!!! =) The love i leaned on pierced my heart, the hands i clung to loosened themsleves from mine. the moon was darkened by a misty doubt, and my candle's little flame went out. While i swayed, weak, trembling and alone, the everlasting arms held my own. My burdens did the Lord Almighty help me bear, while generously showering His tender loving care. Despite all of my immense pain and sorrow, even though i am left without a purpose or aim, Iknow for a fact that yesterday, today and forevermore, My Lord God will be the Same! ------------------------------------------------------------------- Dear restless heart, dont moan and be sorrow so. Be still! for peace is found just by looking at His smile. He has a meaning for the chilly winds that blow. Just hope, and hope and hope, until in Him you braver grow. God is always there! He will never, ever flee! Just pray, and pray, and pray till' you have faith to see! ------------------------------------------------------------------ Everything seems so so bleak, "I'll put my trust in him", my bruised heart faintly murmured, as over me rolled a huge crushing boulder of woe. I am singing without the sound of melodious music, without the sound of tuneful strings. I am crushed and defeated but i will continue to trust and ride on his caring wings.
